DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study To demonstrate difference change bone level around P.004 implant 1st stage surgery 6 month post surgery transmucosal implant placement compare submerge implant placement
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study Comparing Submerged Versus Trans-mucosal Healing P.004 Implants Anterior Mandible Maxilla
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study determine level bone maintain relation implant shoulder P.004 two-stage implant place submerge trans-mucosal procedure single tooth gap anterior region . The primary parameter measure radiography 26 week load implant .
DOC.criteria: Males female > 18 year age . Implant placement plan anterior maxilla mandible ( FDI tooth number 21 25 , 11 15 , 3135 , 4145 ) . Tooth site must natural tooth mesially distally adjacent tooth position Opposing dentition natural teeth , tooth implantsupported fixed restoration . Adequate bone quality quantity implant site permit insertion Straumann P.004 SLActive implant 8 , 10 , 12 , 14 mm length . Presence sufficient band keratinize mucosa ( min . 2 mm ) allow surgical manipulation suture accord protocol Signed informed consent document treat study Systemic disease would interfere dental implant therapy ( e.g . uncontrolled diabetes ) Any contraindication oral surgical procedure Current untreated periodontitis gingivitis Probing pocket depth 4 mm one adjacent teeth Mucosal diseases ( e.g . erosive lichen planus ) History local irradiation therapy Bone augmentation procedure procedure require healing time 12 week implant placement Implants adjacent position plan implant Severe bruxing clench habit Heavy smoker : Patients smoke 20 cigarette per day Conditions circumstance , opinion investigator , would prevent completion study participation . Patients inadequate oral hygiene unmotivated adequate home care Secondary Exclusion Criteria Implant Surgery : Lack primary stability implant Inappropriate implant position insert implant accord prosthetic requirement . Patients augmentation procedure require 12 week heal time .
